column1: The Purple Pig////The Grilled broccoli was also very tasty. Love how they could turn such a basic vegetable into something so full of flavor but not too overpowering with the vinaigrette. The Crispy Pig Ears were a little too salty for my taste but most of my party enjoyed it. In addition to these
column2: we also got the Pork Belly. Was pretty good
column3: the meat very soft and easy to cut through. The star of the show was definitely still the Bone Marrow though.
